descriptionQuickMenu.message: Enable quick menu to quickly access settings and help
descriptionQuickMenu.description: Enable quick menu to quickly access settings and help

descriptionEnableQuickMenu.message: This will enable the quick menu which appears bellow text selection on any webpage. I recommend disabling it if you feel it intrusive, you can still use your prompts on selected text by right clicking and selecting the prompt from the context menu.
descriptionEnableQuickMenu.description: Enable quick menu to quickly access settings and help

YouCanGetYourAPIKey.message: You can get your API key from AI service provider official website
YouCanGetYourAPIKey.description: You can get your API key from AI service provider official website

EnterBaseURL.message: Enter your custom API base URL(optional)
EnterBaseURL.description: Enter your custom API base URL(optional)

descriptionModeTweak.message: Tweak temperature of response. Creative will generate more non deterministic responses, Precise will generate more deterministic responses.
descriptionModeTweak.description: Tweak temperature of response. Creative will generate more non deterministic responses, Precise will generate more deterministic responses.

descriptionTheme.message: Change theme of the sidebar and quick menu
descriptionTheme.description: Change theme of the sidebar and quick menu

descriptionWebpageContext.message: Enable DeepChat to answer questions based on the current webpage content
descriptionWebpageContext.description: Enable DeepChat to answer questions based on the current webpage content

descriptionCategory.message: Categories are used to organize your prompts. Once you create a new category or prompt, they will go at last in the list. You can drag and drop them to reorder them as you wish.
descriptionCategory.description: Categories are used to organize your prompts. Once you create a new category or prompt, they will go at last in the list. You can drag and drop them to reorder them as you wish.

descriptionCustomizePrompts.message: You can organize the prompts in the quick menu by dragging and dropping these items. You can also edit the prompts by clicking the edit button and adding new prompts.
descriptionCustomizePrompts.description: You can organize the prompts in the quick menu by dragging and dropping these items. You can also edit the prompts by clicking the edit button and adding new prompts.

systemPrompt.message: You are DeepChat, a chatbot in browser docked to right side of the screen.
systemPrompt.description: You are DeepChat, a chatbot in browser docked to right side of the screen.
